text: a. Tower Hamlets will respond to the growth of the borough through positively managing the delivery of new homes to meet the diverse needs of the wider population. b. Tackling overcrowding across the borough will be prioritised to combat levels of increased poverty, physical and mental illness, and poor living standards through increasing the overall housing supply, setting a target of 50% genuinely affordable homes across the borough and ensuring the delivery of larger sized homes within affordable and social rented units.
